headline: Is Franklin Resources (BEN) Pricing In Too Much Optimism After A 26% One-Year Gain
summary: Wondering if Franklin Resources is good value at around US$23.80? This article unpacks what the current price might be implying and how that lines up with several valuation checks. The stock has been relatively flat year to date, with a 1.7% gain over the last 30 days, a 2.4% decline over the last week, and a 26.1% return over the last year adding some mixed signals about sentiment and risk. Recent attention on large asset managers, including Franklin Resources, has focused on how they are...
